css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);min-width:initial;height:30px;flex-direction:row;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-start;}body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u hr.maxi-divider-block__divider{border-color:var(--maxi-dark-divider-color,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,5,23,33),1));border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:none;border-top-width:2px;height:2px;width:40px;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u{height:52px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u hr.maxi-divider-block__divider{width:50px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u{height:20px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #divider-maxi-48306a48-u{justify-content:center;}}
